0.0: Gain "Ode to Flowers" after Normal or Plunging Attacks hit an opponent: DEF increases by <cryo>10%</cryo> for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can trigger once per 0.1s. When this effect reaches 2 stacks or the 2nd stack's duration is refreshed, increase Normal and Plunging Attack CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG by <cryo>1%/8%</cryo> respectively for every 1,000 DEF the equipping character has, up to a maximum of <cryo>3.2%/25.6%</cryo>. Also increases other party members' All Elemental DMG Bonus on the same basis by <cryo>8%</cryo>, up to a maximum of <cryo>25.6%</cryo>. These increases last 15s. Elemental DMG Bonuses gained by characters in this way cannot stack.

1.0: Gain "Ode to Flowers" after Normal or Plunging Attacks hit an opponent: DEF increases by <cryo>12.5%</cryo> for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can trigger once per 0.1s. Also increases other party members' All Elemental DMG Bonus on the same basis by <cryo>10%</cryo>, up to a maximum of <cryo>32%</cryo>. These increases last 15s. Elemental DMG Bonuses gained by characters in this way cannot stack.
